goal_descEN: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
target_descEN: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable
indicator_descEN: Proportion of population covered by social protection floors/systems, by sex, distinguishing children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims and the poor and the vulnerable
series_tags: ['poverty', 'standard of living', 'basic needs', 'social welfare', 'child welfare', 'family welfare', 'maternal welfare', 'women', 'mothers', 'children']
seriesDescription: [ILO] Proportion of mothers with newborns receiving maternity cash benefit (percent)
sources: ILO estimates based on country data compled through the ILO Social Security Inquiry (SSI)
